page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are{few opportunities}for employment other than Weardale Minerals Processing Plant & farming. There are also four road haulage contractors, and a Hay and Straw Merchant who also transports animals. The{local craftsmen}are mainly one or two men businesses. They are builders, plumbers,a heating engineer, a decorator, a chimney sweep and a window cleaner. A mechanic and his son run a motor repair garage. The{shops}are all family concerns except the Co-Op. Some{women work}in hospitals at Stanhope or Wolsingham and some do domestic work. Most people have to{commute}to Bishop Auckland, Durham and further to work in offices, schools, universities and industries. Others work in Middle East.
